peopleAlsoAsk.question: How much do antique appraisers charge?
peopleAlsoAsk.snippet: The antique appraisal cost can vary significantly depending on various factors, such as the size and age of the item, the level of expertise required, and the location of the appraiser. However, sellers generally expect to pay anywhere from $50 to $200 for an initial appraisal by a certified appraiser.
peopleAlsoAsk.title: How Much Does It Cost To Get an Antique Appraised? - Lion & Unicorn

peopleAlsoAsk.question: How do I know if my antique is valuable?
peopleAlsoAsk.snippet: If you are looking to sell, it's always a smart idea to reach out to an expert to fully evaluate the piece and give you an accurate appraisal. Some larger auction houses—like Heritage Auction—offer complimentary auction assessments where specialists review the item and provide information on its possible value.
